Package io.straas.android.sdk.circall

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CircallStream
    CircallStream provides methods for CirCall stream related operation.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CircallConfig
    CircallConfig is used in CircallManager.prepareForCameraCapture(android.content.Context, io.straas.android.sdk.circall.CircallConfig).
    CircallConfig.Builder  
    CircallManager
    CircallManager is used to manage a Straas CirCall client.
    CircallPlayerView
    A wrapper class for TextureView to encapsulate OpenGL for the renderer operation of CirCall video stream.
    CircallPublishConfig
    CircallPublishConfig is used in CircallManager.publishWithCameraCapture(CircallPublishConfig).
    CircallPublishConfig.Builder  
    CircallPublishWithUrlConfig
    Used in CircallManager.publishWithUrl(CircallPublishWithUrlConfig).
    CircallPublishWithUrlConfig.Builder  
    CircallRecordingStreamMetadata
    CircallRecordingStreamMetadata is used in CircallManager.getRecordingStreamMetadata().
    CircallToken
    CircallToken represents a room CirCall token.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    CircallConfig.CAMERA_TYPE
    Camera types, including CircallConfig.CAMERA_FRONT and CircallConfig.CAMERA_BACK
    CircallManager.CircallState
    Show state of CircallManager, including CircallManager.STATE_IDLE, CircallManager.STATE_PREPARING, CircallManager.STATE_PREPARED, CircallManager.STATE_CONNECTING, CircallManager.STATE_CONNECTED and CircallManager.STATE_DISCONNECTING,
    CircallPlayerView.SCALING_MODE
    Scaling modes, including CircallPlayerView.ASPECT_FIT, CircallPlayerView.ASPECT_FILL and CircallPlayerView.FILL
